```{r setup}
library(mve)
```

```{r arguments}
if (FALSE) {
  # Declare arguments for manual testing
  data <- mve::chilko
  index <- 41:66 # 61:68
  response <- "recruits"
  lags <- list(spawners = 0:8, flow = 0)
  within_row <- TRUE
  n_best <- ceiling(sqrt(2^length(unlist(lags))))
  superset <- lags
  cores <- 4
}

```

```{r forecast}
if (FALSE) {
  # SVE
  output <- mve::sve(
    data = data,
    index = index,
    response = response,
    lags = lags,
    within_row = within_row,
    superset = superset
  )
  # MVE
  multi <- mve::mve(
    data = data,
    index = index,
    response = response,
    lags = lags,
    within_row = within_row,
    n_best = n_best,
    cores = cores
  )
  # View
  tibble::view(multi$forecasts)
  tibble::view(multi$hindsight)
  tibble::view(multi$results)
  tibble::view(multi$summary)
  
}

```
